result.title: Pilot road construction and monitoring
result.description: This deliverable is connected with Task 6.5 (Pilot road construction using SRM based construction products). It will consist on a demonstration performed in three road construction pilots using 100% alternative materials for subbase and base courses as well as surface course. The roads will turn on demonstration sites. The SRM based construction products used in the pilot will be manufactured according to the results of the WP5, where also a plan and detail design for pilot road demonstration activities will be developed. The detailed configuration of the roads will be included as part of the information provided for promotion purposes. 3 pilot roads will be constructed, one in Maribor (Slovenia), one in Skopje (North Macedonia) and one in Madrid-Henares (Spain).

result.title: Construction and monitoring of pilot facilities
result.description: This deliverable is connected with Task 6.4 (Construction of pilot facilities). It will detail the process of pilots deployment, describing main stages and potential deviations from the original design. It will also compile the data related to monitoring measurements for the assessment of the demonstration cases in terms of structural, constructional, geotechnical and environmental requirements of the application of SRM in construction of small scale facilities.

result.title: Communication materials
result.description: This deliverable is connected with Task 8.3 (Communication). It will include: general project leaflet, 4 posters, event tailored brochures, E-newsletters (multilingual), final project brochure promoting individual project outcomes, press pack, to be prepared by the WP leader in English language and then translated by project partners and adapted, at least 4 press releases, detailing the achievements of the project to be sent out to magazines, media and related publications (both professional as well as the ones dedicated to general public, and multimedia materials from the pilots (photos, video capsules etc).

result.title: Two-day Final conference
result.description: This deliverable is connected with Task 8.1 (Dissemination of project results). The two day event will be international and dedicated to presentation of final project outcomes to a broad group of stakeholders and to raise their awareness about the new opportunities and business models created and tested under CINDIRELLA. Beside the presentations, interaction sessions with investors and other stakeholders addressing the needs of the urban construction sector will be organized to create a practical pathway to bring the results of CINDERELA close-to-the-market practice. The conference will be organized in M48, locations considered include Brussels or Amsterdam.
